climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbon Neutral Certified by SCS Global Services means the product’s carbon emissions have been measured and reduced, with any remaining emissions offset.

features: Contoured design: Comfortable shape with soft side grips
Logitech Advanced Optical Tracking: Enjoy point-and-click precision and smooth scrolling
Unifying Receiver: Robust wireless connection with one tiny USB receiver that stays in your laptop
Long battery life: Up to 12 months of battery life virtually eliminates the need to change batteries
Wide compatibility: Works with Windows, Mac and Linux computers
Note : In case of Wireless mouse, the USB receiver will be provided inside or along with the mouse
body.description: Logitech Wireless Mouse M317. The feel-good, reliable wireless mouse that'll make you forget the touchpad. Everything you do on your laptop is just easier thanks to Logitech Advanced Optical Tracking. Logitech Advanced 2.4 GHz wireless provides a powerful, reliable connection with virtually no delays or dropouts. All in a tiny nano-receiver you can plug in and forget. Small and portable, M317 is equally great for working at home or on the go. It’s sized perfectly for most surfaces, limited workspaces, as well as users with smaller hands and kids—making it a great option for homeschooling. Compatible with all the main OS and easy-to-use, it’s ready to work in seconds. Plus, you get a 1-year battery life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm very happy with this mouse. It has a good, solid feel and a responsive touch. I use it to over-ride the finger pad on my laptop, since I don't use that well. It has been great so far, but I haven't had it long enough to comment on the battery life and I'm not a gamer so can't speak to that. Arrived as promised; and great value for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered to use with laptop. Installation very easy. It works perfectly. It was sold at a great price. I love that it has an on/off switch which should limit battery draining. Could not be more pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great and looks good!
reviews.reviewText: Responsive, comfortable and works well. Love the color and the grooves for thumb and fingers feel comfortable and ergonomic. Buttons and wheel are relyable and I like that it has a storage compartment insde the battery door to store the reciever when not in use. Really no downsides to this mouse and the price was excellent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This mouse works on laptop smoothly
reviews.reviewText: I bought 2 of these mouses; color, pretty blue, for my WIN10 laptop and it works smoothly when you insert it’s small piece into the side of laptop.- There is a small switch on the mouse to turn on, green; and to turn off, red color. The inserted special size A battery states it is supposed to last long for several months.- However, I could not get this mouse to work on my desktop computer too so there is an error with the advertisement details.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Legacy of Quality and Excellence - Logitech M317 Wireless Mouse Review
reviews.reviewText: I've been a devoted fan of Logitech mice for years, and the Logitech M317 Wireless Mouse in Blue has once again exceeded my expectations. What makes it truly exceptional is not only its contemporary features but also its connection to the legacy of Logitech's commitment to quality. Here's why I consider it an outstanding choice:Great Portable Size with Cute and Classy Design:The mouse's compact size makes it highly portable, and the cute blue and black color scheme adds a touch of class. It's the perfect blend of style and functionality.Durability and Shock Resistance:This mouse is built like a tank. I've accidentally dropped it several times, and it has proven to be remarkably durable and shock-resistant. The build quality instills confidence in its longevity.Reliable and Steady Connection:The 2.4 GHz wireless technology ensures a reliable and steady connection. I've experienced no lag or interruptions during use, making it a dependable companion for everyday tasks.Very Long Battery Life and Easy to Change:The 12-month battery life is impressive, and changing the battery is a breeze. It uses a single AA battery, accommodating both alkaline and rechargeable options, providing flexibility and convenience.Great Ergonomics - Small Yet Comfortable:The mouse's ergonomic design strikes a perfect balance between being compact and comfortable. It fits snugly in my hand, and the smooth clicks make navigation a joy.Buttery and Precise Scroll Wheel:The scroll wheel is not only buttery smooth but also precise. It enhances the overall user experience, especially during long sessions of web browsing or document scrolling.Driver-Free Installation and Universal Compatibility:Setting up the M317 is hassle-free. Even during a fresh operating system installation, my computer recognized it without the need for additional drivers or a wired mouse. It's a plug-and-play device at its finest.Legacy Continuation - Upgrading from the M185:As a testament to Logitech's commitment to quality, I had been using the Logitech M185 Wireless Mouse since its release in 2011. Recently, I made the seamless transition to the M317, not because the M185 was faulty – quite the opposite. The upgrade was a choice to experience the latest in Logitech's legacy while maintaining the same old-classy mouse design that has proven its durability over the years.In conclusion, the Logitech M317 Wireless Mouse is a harmonious blend of contemporary features and a continuation of Logitech's legacy. It's not just a mouse; it's a reliable companion that combines style with substance, making it a standout choice for anyone in search of a top-notch wireless mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice mouse
reviews.reviewText: Works great. Easy to install, excellent quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Logitech M317 Wireless Mouse - A Compact Marvel of Precision and Convenience!
reviews.reviewText: The Logitech M317 Wireless Mouse has truly exceeded my expectations, proving to be a stellar addition to my computing setup. This mouse seamlessly combines precision, reliability, and convenience in a compact design.The 2.4 GHz wireless connectivity, coupled with the USB receiver, ensures a fast and stable connection, eliminating the hassle of tangled wires. The 1000 DPI optical tracking delivers precise cursor control, making every click and movement feel incredibly smooth.The ergonomic design fits comfortably in my hand, and the compact size is perfect for on-the-go productivity. The battery life is impressive, providing long-lasting usage without frequent replacements. The mouse's simplicity doesn't compromise its functionality, and the responsive buttons add to the overall user experience.Whether I'm working on tasks or navigating through web pages, the Logitech M317 has become my go-to mouse. It's a 5-star product that effortlessly combines performance with convenience. Highly recommended for anyone in need of a reliable and compact wireless mouse!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This mouse is small and I feel great while I use it. Works quickly and smoothly
reviews.reviewText: I love the way it feels and works. No complaints
Muy buen producto. Cómodo y práctico
Cómodo, práctico y da un excelente rendimiento la pila!

reviews.reviewTitle: Wanted similar to my last one that finally died
reviews.reviewText: I am 65, retired, and don't need a fancy mouse with a 101 buttons and selections. My last simple mouse finally died so I wanted one that was similar. This one should do just fine.

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy manejable y compacto, tanto para sobremesa como laptop
reviews.reviewText: Así es, es polivalente por ser wireless. Funciona perfectamente con lo que el haber sido un producto reacondicionado me ha resultado muy útil pues estaba casi a mitad de precio que el modelo original, precintado y tal...Teóricamente (comprobado por internet) es compatible con el unifying del teclado MK330 que es para lo que lo compré. Esta tarde lo comprobaré y de ser así le puedo poner 5 estrellas.Comprobado y efectivamente he podido unirlo al mismo receptor unifying del teclado con lo que ahora me sobra el de este ratón (voy a ver si le puedo dar utilidad igualmente).
